title: New Numbers! Chuck & Mark Geek Out Over Latest NBC/WSJ Poll
description: It's Polling Day! Chuck Todd & Mark Murray take a deep dive inside the latest NBC News/Wall Street Journal Poll to discuss healthcare, the president and polarization among voters.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
